title: Test harness called mladmin abort on 5.0 Linux-64-RH6 in test bug16654.xml

changeHistory.comment:
Sumit,
Please tell me which XQuery command in bug16654.xml file caused the system to hang.  I need more specific information in order to assign an engineer to work on it.

We have not encountered this issue again after bug logged. It is not reproducible. Hence closing this issue.
I will log a new bug, if it occurs again.
